APA style
data_quality_explanation: explanation why the study was ranked, if needed
sum_total_richness: how many species were observed in the study, at ALL strata combined
sum_total_abundance: how many organisms were observed in the study, at ALL strata combined
method: how was abundance/richness measured in the field?
study_start_date: start date of the study's data collection
study_end_date: end date of the study's data collection
